ValidationRule.description: Cannot enter a HSA Cancel Date until pending Tasks are completed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISNULL(HSA_Cancel_Date_Entered__c ))&& ( CONTAINS( Pending_FSA_Tasks__c , "Future HSA Last Check Date")|| CONTAINS( Pending_FSA_Tasks__c , "CPR NPR Callout")|| CONTAINS( Pending_FSA_Tasks__c , "Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot fill out "HSA Cancel Date Entered" until the following Pending Tasks are Resolved: Future HSA, Last Check Date, CPR NPR Callout, and Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy
